listitem.para: Whether or not to enable Extended Sequence Number (ESN) for the IPsec SA. ESN is typically used for very high-speed links (10Gbps or faster) where the standard 32 bit sequence number is exhausted too quickly, causing IPsec SA's rekeys to happen too often. Accepted values are no (the default), yes and either. If either is specified as an initiator, the responder will make the choice. As a responder, if either is received, no is picked.
